string-array.name: Chapter1_dialog
string-array.item: Jimmy wake up! Wake up you lazy jerk!
Leave me alone! It's to early to be awake anyway!
FAKI!!! What are you think you doing?!
Just waking a lazy jerk, noting else
In 5 minute time we should report to Day master
You are right, yet I promise you, that you will regret about that bucket of cold water later
I ready, lets be on our way.
